text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Ahh.  Fox news trying to create a diversion for Trump because of his stupid injecting disinfectant  for covid-19 fiasco. Trying to make Biden look like he is guilty of sexual assault. Fox news, the propaganda media for Donald. Sick sick sick. Time to drink the bleach.
